alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 14 at 12:44AM CST until December 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 586 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA FRANKLIN MADISON TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 26 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW COPIAH HINDS HOLMES LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON SMITH YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI NESHOBA NEWTON WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, CONEHATTA, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DECATUR, DURANT, EUPORA, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, FOREST, GOODMAN, GRENADA, HARRISONBURG, HAZLEHURST, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, KOSCIUSKO, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MADISON, MAGEE, MATHISTON, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, MORTON, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, NEWTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RALEIGH, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROXIE, ST. JOSEPH, TALLULAH, TAYLORSVILLE, TCHULA, UNION, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WINNSBORO, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
